## TimeSpan.negate() method

Returns a new TimeSpan object whose value is the negated value of this instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
negate(): TimeSpan;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

TimeSpan

TimeSpan - A new object with the same numeric value as this instance, but with the opposite sign.
